name: Past Recollections: A Family's Tragedy
description:
Past Recollections: A Family's Tragedy Synopsis::

Find your roots and connect with your story. In this game, join a little girl discovering the origins of her family and the difficulties they faced in the world before she was born.

------

How to Play:

WASD - Walk;

E -  Interacting
